SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! Add read action, URL and skip SSL validation to java arguments
! Veracode Java API Wrapper Path : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_VER_API_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX
: SET &UC4RB_CMD# = 'java -jar &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# -action &ACTION_NAME#'
! API ID : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_VER_API_ID# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " -vid &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! API key is decrypted : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_VER_API_KEY#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD export VER_DECRYPTED_PWD=$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " -vkey $VER_DECRYPTED_PWD")
! Proxy host : IF &UC4RB_VER_PROXY_HOST# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_VER_PROXY_HOST# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " -phost &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Proxy port : IF &UC4RB_VER_PROXY_PORT# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_VER_PROXY_PORT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " -pport &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Proxy user : IF &UC4RB_VER_PROXY_USER# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_VER_PROXY_USER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " -puser &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Proxy Password : IF &UC4RB_VER_PROXY_PASS# <> "--10" OR "" : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_VER_PROXY_PASS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " -ppassword $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD") : ENDIF
